test.name: 4.6.6 STC OS UPGRADE CREATE NEW JOB-PLATFORM MODEL CHANGE EFFECTS ON DEPENDENT FIELDS

kw.name: Testcase setup
Start Browser
kw.doc: Browser.start_browser(self, browser_name=u'firefox', download_path=None, screenshot_path=None, remote_url=None, flash=False, proxy_urls=None)

kw.name: Login to BPA UI "${login.bpa_url}" with credentials "${login.bpa_username}" and "${login.bpa_password}"
set browser timeout to "${BPA__MAX_WAIT_TIME}" seconds
clear the browser cookies
visit "${url}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__TXT_UID_XPATH}"
enter "${username}" in the field with XPath "${BPA__TXT_UID_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__TXT_PWD_XPATH}"
enter "${password}" in the field with XPath "${BPA__TXT_PWD_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__BTN_LOGIN_XPATH}"
click on the object with XPath "${BPA__BTN_LOGIN_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__LBL_DASHBOARD_XPATH}"
set browser timeout to "${BPA__MAX_WAIT_TIME}" seconds
Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: click on the object with XPath "${BPA_OS_UPGRADE_TILE_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA_SELECT_DEVICE_LBL_TILE}"
Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: STC upgrade select device "${osupgrade.device_name}"
kw.doc: This keyword retrieves list of devices in the selected BOA environment in STC.

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__SELECT_CREATE_NEW_XPATH}"
Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: click on the object with XPath "${BPA__SELECT_CREATE_NEW_XPATH}"
Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: Create device values with active os upgrade status reset model platform "${osupgrade.create_new}"
kw.doc: This keyword retrieves list of devices in the selected BOA environment in STC.
kw.msg: Inside loop the drop down value <selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="8b3a38c9d7a1f65115139d8f468b0c07", element="0.05260958184108144-12")> The value of device xpath is //mat-option//child::span[contains(text(), "ASR-920-24TZ-M")] Inside loop the drop down value <selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="8b3a38c9d7a1f65115139d8f468b0c07", element="0.05260958184108144-14")> The value of device xpath is //mat-option//child::span[contains(text(), "UPE92")] Inside loop the drop down value <selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="8b3a38c9d7a1f65115139d8f468b0c07", element="0.05260958184108144-16")> The value of device xpath is //mat-option//child::span[contains(text(), "3.18.5SP")] Inside loop the drop down value <selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="8b3a38c9d7a1f65115139d8f468b0c07", element="0.05260958184108144-18")> The value of device xpath is //mat-option//child::span[contains(text(), "FTP")] Inside loop the drop down value <selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="8b3a38c9d7a1f65115139d8f468b0c07", element="0.05260958184108144-20")> The value of device xpath is //mat-option//child::span[contains(text(), "Approved")] ******************************************************************88 The dict value passed here is {'Select Platform Model': 'ASR-920-24TZ-M', 'Select Device Role': 'UPE92', 'Select Release Software Version': '3.18.5SP', 'File Transfer Protocol': 'FTP', 'mdt_number': 123, 'Approval Status': 'Approved', 'mutilselect_device': 'STC-ASR920-1'} The value of drop down is shown below <selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="8b3a38c9d7a1f65115139d8f468b0c07", element="0.05260958184108144-22")> The xpath value created here is //mat-option //child::span[contains(text()," ASR-920-12SZ-IM ")]

kw.name: Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

Wait for the loading icon to disappear

kw.name: click on the object with XPath "${BPA__SELECT_OK_CONFIRMATION}"
Testcase teardown
Logout of BPA UI
set browser timeout to "${BPA__MAX_WAIT_TIME}" seconds
Wait for the loading icon to disappear
kw.doc: Method to wait for loading icon to disappear

kw.name: wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__MENU_PROFILE_XPATH}"
click on the object with XPath "${BPA__MENU_PROFILE_XPATH}"
wait until object is clickable via XPath "${BPA__MENU_LOGOUT_XPATH}"
click on the object with XPath "${BPA__MENU_LOGOUT_XPATH}"
close browser
